mainBoard.name: Departed Deckhand
mainBoard.originalText:
When Departed Deckhand becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it.
Departed Deckhand can't be blocked except by Spirits.
{3}{U}: Another target creature you control can't be blocked this turn except by Spirits.

rulings.text: Activating Departed Deckhand's last ability after a creature has become blocked by a non-Spirit creature won't cause that creature to become unblocked.
If the spell that targets Departed Deckhand has no other targets, it won't resolve (because it no longer has a legal target after Departed Deckhand is sacrificed).
You'll sacrifice Departed Deckhand even if you counter the spell that targets it.

mainBoard.text:
When this creature becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it.
This creature can't be blocked except by Spirits.
{3}{U}: Another target creature you control can't be blocked this turn except by Spirits.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Lungs full of sea air and a hold full of loot. Ah, what a life!"
mainBoard.name: Corsair Captain
mainBoard.originalText:
When Corsair Captain enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
Other Pirates you control get +1/+1.

rulings.text: Because damage remains marked on a creature until the damage is removed as the turn ends, nonlethal damage dealt to Pirates you control may become lethal if Corsair Captain leaves the battlefield during that turn.

mainBoard.text:
When this creature enters, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")
Other Pirates you control get +1/+1.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Any ship that sails on these mean seas for long is bound to pick up a ghost or two."
—Admiral Beckett Brass
mainBoard.name: Spectral Sailor
mainBoard.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
{3}{U}: Draw a card.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Why perch in the crow's nest when I can fly like the crows?"
mainBoard.name: Kitesail Corsair
mainBoard.originalText: Kitesail Corsair has flying as long as it's attacking.

rulings.text: Kitesail Corsair has flying immediately after it attacks. This means that combat restrictions on creatures with flying don't apply, but abilities that trigger when a creature with flying attacks do trigger.

mainBoard.text: This creature has flying as long as it's attacking.

mainBoard.flavorText: The floating city of High and Dry hasn't yet sunk under the weight of gold, but it's not for want of trying.
mainBoard.name: Prosperous Pirates
mainBoard.originalText: When Prosperous Pirates enters the battlefield, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
mainBoard.text: When this creature enters, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

mainBoard.flavorText: The view is truly spectacular—as long as you don't look at Rishada itself.
mainBoard.name: Rishadan Airship
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Rishadan Airship can block only creatures with flying.
mainBoard.text:
Flying
This creature can block only creatures with flying.

mainBoard.flavorText: The rising tide of Orazca's plunder lifted all ships.
mainBoard.name: Sailor of Means
mainBoard.originalText: When Sailor of Means enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
mainBoard.text: When this creature enters, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

mainBoard.flavorText: While other pirates prowl for treasure, Captain Parrish plunders secrets.
mainBoard.name: Chart a Course
mainBoard.originalText: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you attacked with a creature this turn.
mainBoard.text: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you attacked this turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: Charts and instruments work fine, but the best navigators aren't above a spell or two to nudge the tides in a more favorable direction.

foreignData.flavorText: Karten und Instrumente funktionieren gut, doch selbst die besten Navigatoren sind sich nicht zu fein für ein, zwei Zaubersprüche, die die Gezeiten in eine günstigere Richtung lenken.
foreignData.name: Die Gezeiten lesen
foreignData.text:
Bestimme eines —
• Ziehe drei Karten.
• Bringe bis zu zwei Kreaturen deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück.

foreignData.flavorText: Los mapas y los instrumentos funcionan bien, pero los mejores navegantes solo necesitan uno o dos hechizos para impulsar las mareas en una dirección más favorable.
foreignData.name: Conocer las mareas
foreignData.text:
Elige uno:
• Roba tres cartas.
• Regresa hasta dos criaturas objetivo a las manos de sus propietarios.

foreignData.flavorText: Les plans et les instruments sont pratiques, mais les meilleurs navigateurs ne sont jamais contre un sort ou deux qui pourraient leur donner des marées plus favorables.
foreignData.name: Déchiffrage des marées
foreignData.text:
Choisissez l'un —
• Piochez trois cartes.
• Renvoyez jusqu'à deux créatures ciblées dans les mains de leurs propriétaires.

foreignData.flavorText: Mappe e strumenti sono utili, ma i migliori navigatori non disdegnano di lanciare una magia o due per spingere le maree in una direzione più favorevole.
foreignData.name: Leggere le Maree
foreignData.text:
Scegli uno —
• Pesca tre carte.
• Fai tornare fino a due creature bersaglio in mano ai rispettivi proprietari.

foreignData.flavorText: 海図や計器も役には立つが、最高の航海士ですらも、潮の流れを変えてしまう呪文には敵わない。
foreignData.name: 潮読み
foreignData.text:
以下から１つを選ぶ。
• カードを３枚引く。
• クリーチャー最大２体を対象とし、それらをオーナーの手札に戻す。

foreignData.flavorText: 도표와 계측기들도 좋긴 하지만, 최고의 항해사라고 해도 파도를 좀 더 좋은 방향으로 밀어주는 주문 한두 번과 그다지 차이가 나지 않는다.
foreignData.name: 파도 읽기
foreignData.text:
하나를 선택한다 —
• 카드 세 장을 뽑는다.
• 생물을 최대 두 개까지 목표로 정한다. 그 생물들을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.

foreignData.flavorText: As cartas náuticas e os instrumentos funcionam bem, mas os melhores navegadores não abrem mão de um pouco de magia para dar um empurrãozinho favorável nas marés.
foreignData.name: Ler as Marés
foreignData.text:
Escolha um —
• Compre três cards.
• Devolva até duas criaturas alvo para as mãos de seus donos.

foreignData.flavorText: Карты и инструменты — это хорошо, но лучшие навигаторы не гнушаются и заклинанием-другим, чтобы подправить направление течений.
foreignData.name: Гадание по Приливам
foreignData.text:
Выберите одно —
• Возьмите три карты.
• Верните не более двух целевых существ в руки их владельцев.

foreignData.flavorText: 海图和器具固然有用，但最好的领航员只消一两个咒语就能让浪潮朝着自己想要的方向流动。
foreignData.name: 研判浪潮
foreignData.text:
选择一项～
•抓三张牌。
•将至多两个目标生物移回其拥有者手上。

foreignData.flavorText: 海圖和器具固然有用，但最好的領航員只消一兩個咒語就能讓浪潮朝著自己想要的方向流動。
foreignData.name: 研判浪潮
foreignData.text:
選擇一項～
•抽三張牌。
•將至多兩個目標生物移回其擁有者手上。

mainBoard.name: Read the Tides
mainBoard.originalText:
Choose one —
• Draw three cards.
• Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.
mainBoard.text:
Choose one —
• Draw three cards.
• Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.

mainBoard.name: Pirate's Cutlass
mainBoard.originalText:
When Pirate's Cutlass enters the battlefield, attach it to target Pirate you control.
Equipped creature gets +2/+1.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

rulings.text: You can cast Pirate's Cutlass even if you control no Pirates. If you control no Pirates as Pirate's Cutlass enters, its triggered ability will have no effect.

mainBoard.text:
When this Equipment enters, attach it to target Pirate you control.
Equipped creature gets +2/+1.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

mainBoard.name: Curious Obsession
mainBoard.originalText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card."
At the beginning of your end step, if you didn't attack with a creature this turn, sacrifice Curious Obsession.

rulings.text: Curious Obsession's last ability is satisfied if any creature has attacked, similar to raid abilities. The creature it enchants doesn't have to have attacked.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card."
At the beginning of your end step, if you didn't attack with a creature this turn, sacrifice this Aura.

foreignData.name: Gefängnissphäre
foreignData.text:
Aufblitzen (Du kannst diesen Zauberspruch zu jedem Zeitpunkt wirken, zu dem du einen Spontanzauber wirken könntest.)
Verzaubert eine Kreatur
Wenn die Gefängnissphäre ins Spiel kommt, tappe die verzauberte Kreatur.
Die verzauberte Kreatur enttappt nicht während des Enttappsegments ihres Beherrschers.

foreignData.name: Esfera de captura
foreignData.text:
Destello. (Puedes lanzar este hechizo en cualquier momento en que pudieras lanzar un instantáneo.)
Encantar criatura.
Cuando la Esfera de captura entre al campo de batalla, gira la criatura encantada.
La criatura encantada no se endereza durante el paso de enderezar de su controlador.

foreignData.name: Sphère de capture
foreignData.text:
Flash (Vous pouvez lancer ce sort à tout moment où vous pourriez lancer un éphémère.)
Enchanter : créature
Quand la Sphère de capture arrive sur le champ de bataille, engagez la créature enchantée.
La créature enchantée ne se dégage pas pendant l'étape de dégagement de son contrôleur.

foreignData.name: Sfera di Cattura
foreignData.text:
Lampo (Puoi lanciare questa magia in ogni momento in cui potresti lanciare un istantaneo.)
Incanta creatura
Quando la Sfera di Cattura entra nel campo di battaglia, TAPpa la creatura incantata.
La creatura incantata non STAPpa durante lo STAP del suo controllore.

foreignData.name: 捕獲球
foreignData.text:
瞬速（あなたはこの呪文を、あなたがインスタントを唱えられるときならいつでも唱えてよい。）
エンチャント（クリーチャー）
捕獲球が戦場に出たとき、エンチャントしているクリーチャーをタップする。
エンチャントしているクリーチャーは、それのコントローラーのアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignData.name: 포획 구체
foreignData.text:
섬광 (순간마법을 발동할 수 있는 시기라면 당신은 이 주문을 언제든지 발동할 수 있다.)
생물에게 부여
포획 구체가 전장에 들어올 때, 부여된 생물을 탭한다.
부여된 생물은 조종자의 언탭단에 언탭되지 않는다.

foreignData.name: Esfera de Captura
foreignData.text:
Lampejo (Você poderá conjurar esta mágica a qualquer momento em que puder conjurar uma mágica instantânea.)
Encantar criatura
Quando Esfera de Captura entrar no campo de batalha, vire a criatura encantada.
A criatura encantada não é desvirada durante a etapa de desvirar de seu controlador.

foreignData.name: Ловчая Сфера
foreignData.text:
Миг (Вы можете разыграть это заклинание при любой возможности разыгрывать мгновенные заклинания.)
Зачаровать существо
Когда Ловчая Сфера выходит на поле битвы, поверните зачарованное существо.
Зачарованное существо не разворачивается во время шага разворота контролирующего его игрока.

foreignData.name: 拘捕法球
foreignData.text:
闪现（你可以于你能够施放瞬间的时机下施放此咒语。）
结附于生物
当拘捕法球进战场时，横置所结附的生物。
所结附的生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。

foreignData.name: 拘捕法球
foreignData.text:
閃現（你可以於你能夠施放瞬間的時機下施放此咒語。）
結附於生物
當拘捕法球進戰場時，橫置所結附的生物。
所結附的生物於其操控者的重置步驟中不能重置。

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
mainBoard.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

mainBoard.flavorText: All the wonders of the natural world in one breathtaking microcosm.

As Thriving Isle enters the battlefield, choose a color other than blue.
{T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.
